job.title: Software Engineer Mobile (React)
job.description: Our CONFIDENTIAL, venture-backed, growth client is hiring a Senior Mobile Engineer (React Native) who has a strong aptitude for identifying opportunities to improve user experience, robust experience translating design into code, and a proactive desire to collaborate with fellow developers, designers, and product managers to build amazing apps. Position is full-time either in NYC, Chicago, LA, SF, or Portland and will report to the Manager of Mobile Engineering. Responsibilities: Collaborate with product managers, designers, and backend engineers to design and deliver high-quality products on iOS and Android Build efficient and reusable UI components and architect reliable, performant, and maintainable solutions Lead teams that continuously build, ship, learn, and iterate. Drive technical innovation, processes, and best practices required to deliver best-in-class mobile applications Mentor and develop a high-performing team of engineers Qualifications: You have at least 4 years of experience building mobile applications You have used React Native to build cross-platform mobile applications You are comfortable working with JavaScript/Typescript, but also not afraid to jump into Swift or Kotlin as needed You have knowledge of mobile best practices and stay informed about innovations in the mobile industry You have a strong understanding of UX/UI concepts and a demonstrated record of design sensibility Preferred Qualifications: Experience working with Bitcoin, Ethereum, and/or blockchain technology a huge plus Once you apply, we’ll send you all company information and a highlight of their leadership team.
